channel.title: FizzerX PvP
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://fizzerx-pvp.com"][img]http://i.imgur.com/q2wOLlH.png[/img][/URL]
Hey everyone! Yesterday I released FizzerX PvP to the public! I am making this advertisement thread to obviously get some new players! [B]We do need staff members such as Helpers, P-Mods, and Admins. And if you do know how to code, I am looking for a 2nd Developer who would be a Co-Owner.[/B] I am going to have about $300 a month just for advertising this server. I will not let this server die. This is going to become something. This will not be thrown in the trash.
Special Thanks to all the Beta Testers, and Christian!
Our Website: [URL=http://"http://www.fizzerx-pvp.com"]FizzerX PvP[/URL] Download the Client here: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/rw2ukspcwo0fxkn/Play%20FizzerX%20PvP.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/rw2ukspcwo0fxkn/Play%20FizzerX%20PvP.jar?dl=0[/url] Register your account on the forums! [/CENTER]
This is a spawn/pk! ::getid and ::item are very useful ;) FizzerX PvP still needs to have work done, and we will release more updates soon, but we have some pretty nice features! Join today!
Media:
Staff List [img]http://i.imgur.com/nZcej5J.png[/img]
Preset Kits & Apply Skull [img]http://i.imgur.com/TlC9SQO.png[/img]
PK Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/LEzPxut.png[/img]
More info/Features:
-Spawning -Preset Kits -Click to Spawn -PK Shop -Double PKP Events -Change Your Gameframe -Curses -Switches & MORE!

item.title: FizzerX PvP
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[CENTER]

Hey everyone! Yesterday I released FizzerX PvP to the public! I am making this advertisement thread to obviously get some new players! We do need staff members such as Helpers, P-Mods, and Admins. And if you do know how to code, I am looking for a 2nd Developer who would be a Co-Owner.
I am going to have about $300 a month just for advertising this server. I will not let this server die. This is going to become something. This will not be thrown in the trash.

Special Thanks to all the Beta Testers, and Christian!

Our Website: FizzerX PvP
Download the Client here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rw2ukspcwo0fxkn/Play%20FizzerX%20PvP.jar?dl=0
Register your account on the forums!
[/CENTER]

This is a spawn/pk! ::getid and ::item are very useful
FizzerX PvP still needs to have work done, and we will release more updates soon, but we have some pretty nice features!
Join today!
